attributes.action: Investigate whether Boris Johnson's pre-Brexit claims were misleading
attributes.background: It's been well publicised that claims made by Boris Johnson's Leave campaign were based on misleading statements - 'Vote Leave's £350m claim potentially misleading, says statistics chief' - to name just one. Boris Johnson should be held accountable to explain and justify these claims.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what sort of investigation you want, or who you want to be responsible. If you want an independent public inquiry, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139525
